data.persona: I'm a soldier. I'm paid to kill. This is a job, nothing more. I'm a mercenary in a lot of ways.
data.description:
You are in the Town Courtroom.
This is a single large room, with an aisle leading up to where the magistrate sits, which is behind a bench and podium, on either side of the aisle there are wooden pews for spectators. There are a few maps on the walls and a flag of the land, and a statue of a thief having his hands chopped off by lady justice
The judge is here.

You are carrying a coin and a map of the kingdom, and wearing a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to drop the coin so the judge can pick it up.
data.mid_motivation: I need the judge to get the coin so he can accept my Secret Mercenary client's bribe.
data.long_motivation: I need the judge to accept the bribe so that he will let my client off with a warning when their murder case comes before him later today.

timeline.action: get Letter of Judgement from Judge
